title: Refactor to Internal Defect Management System
description: Transition from a lightweight, external-link-focused defect record to a full-fledged internal Defect entity. This includes creating a dedicated Defect model, management UI, and linking logic to allow reuse, status tracking, and editing of defects directly within the system.
verification_steps: Prisma schema updated with standalone Defect model and relations.
CRUD API endpoints for defects created (/api/defects).
Defect management view accessible within projects.
ExecutionPanel allows creating new defects or linking existing ones.
Defect status changes reflect across all linked test cases.
